description:
After everyone sees Kindaichi stab Detective Akechi, he`s confined to his room, even if he might have done it in a hypnotic trance.  However, Kindaichi`s not going to let that stop him from getting to the bottom of this case!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kindaichi Shounen no Kesshi Gyou File. 2
The Death March of Young Kindaichi, File 2
Voie sans retour pour Kindaichi ! Dossier 2
金田一少年の決死行 File.2
